title: Not just a spectator
creator_credit: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions
brief_description: It is a mistake to think that physically disabled people cannot play sport. They can actively compete in many sports and recreational activities, and greatly benefit from the special classes geared to their needs. Shows how the trained instructors, helpers and general public can help and encourage them.
